value.title: Center for Applied Data Ethics suggests treating AI like a bureaucracy
value.excerpt: A new research paper suggests AI practitioners adopt anthropology terms to assess large machine learning models that harm people.

value.title: What Nonprofits Stand To Gain From Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Nonprofits have the opportunity to develop AI powerful algorithms to raise more funds, improve the efficiency of their resources and learn more about their members' needs.

value.title: Democrats ask ethics panel to investigate Sens. Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley
value.excerpt: WASHINGTON (AP) — Seven Democratic senators on Thursday asked Ethics Committee to investigate the actions of Republican Sens. Ted Cruz and Josh Hawley “to fully understand their role” in the Jan. 6 insurrection at the Capitol by supporters of former President Donald Trump.

value.title: AI Systems to get an Ethics Code: DoD
value.excerpt: Ethical considerations will go into Artificial Intelligence (AI)’s design and employment because it enables autonomy, decision making and system execution at incredibly fast speeds, a DoD official said.

value.title: Google union slams company’s treatment of AI ethics researchers
value.excerpt: The Alphabet Workers Union said the actions against Margaret Mitchell and Timnit Gebru "call into question Google’s commitment to ethics."

value.title: Metaethics, Meta-Intelligence And The Rise Of AI
value.excerpt: With every new major transformation at a societal level driven by technology, there will be new concerns and challenges.

value.title: This Chinese Lab Is Aiming for Big AI Breakthroughs
value.excerpt: China produces as many artificial intelligence researchers as the US, but it lags in key fields like machine learning. The government hopes to make up ground.

value.title: Google and its ethics AI team row: What we know so far
value.excerpt: Google has drawn major criticism on the move of sudden investigation of Mitchell and suspension of her system access.

value.title: Google targets AI ethics lead Margaret Mitchell after firing Timnit Gebru
value.excerpt: Margaret Mitchell leads the Google AI ethics team following the firing of Timnit Gebru. Now Google said Mitchell is under investigation.

value.title: Paravision AI ordered to delete face recognition software derived from user pictures without permission
value.excerpt: US face recognition developer has been found to have used pictures from the Ever storage app without permission, and now has to delete all its algorithms.

value.title: Google investigates ethical AI team member over handling of sensitive data
value.excerpt: Alphabet Inc's Google is investigating a member of its ethical AI team and has locked the corporate account linked to that person after finding that thousands of files were retrieved from its server and shared with external accounts,

value.title: 2021 technology trend review, part two: AI, knowledge graphs, and the COVID-19 effect
value.excerpt: AI chips, MLOps, and ethics. Knowledge, and Graphs. COVID-19 as a mixed bag for technological progress and adoption

value.title: Incoming White House science and technology leader on AI, diversity, and society
value.excerpt: Incoming White House science and technology leader Dr. Alondra Nelson addressed the relationship between AI development an inclusion.

value.title: Former DOD Head: The US Needs a New Plan to Beat China on AI
value.excerpt: In an interview with WIRED, former secretary of defense Ash Carter discussed how to build morality into AI—and make sure other countries do too.

value.title: Worried about your firm’s AI ethics? These startups are here to help.
value.excerpt: A growing ecosystem of “responsible AI” ventures promise to help organizations monitor and fix their AI models.

value.title: Microsoft president begs tech industry to improve its ethics
value.excerpt: Speaking at Microsoft's first CES keynote in 10 years, President Brad Smith said that national security is threatened by the industry's inability to learn lessons from the past.

value.title: Controversial chatbot leaves lessons on AI use ethics
value.excerpt: Developers of an artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot have suspended the service after unfiltered inflammatory remarks it delivered sparked

value.title: Microsoft president begs tech industry to improve its ethics
value.excerpt: Speaking at Microsoft's first CES keynote in 10 years, President Brad Smith said that national security is threatened by the industry's inability to learn lessons from the past.

value.title: AI Trends To Watch In 2021
value.excerpt: In order to tackle short-term, long-term and unexpected obstacles, many leaders have turned to AI to help navigate these disruptions.

value.title: What this bald eagle and neural network depiction have to do with future U.S. AI strategy
value.excerpt: The White House launched the National AI Initiatives Office, an org with an eagle and neural network on its seal, to plan U.S. AI strategy.

value.title: Trump admin launches National AI Initiative Office
value.excerpt: The White House today announced the launch of its National AI Initiative Office, marking what should be President Trump‘s final manipulation of the country’s gutted Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP).

value.title: HireVue Leads the Industry with Commitment to Transparent and Ethical Use of AI in Hiring
value.excerpt: HireVue, the global leader in video interviewing, assessments, chatbot and recruiting automation technology, today made two announcements to extend its leadership position defining the transparent and appropriate use of AI and software as part of the hiring process.

value.title: Why ethics should guide artificial intelligence use
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the theory and development of computer systems able to perform tasks that normally require human intelligence. AI makes it possible for machines to learn from experience,

value.title: Five ways to make AI a greater force for good in 2021
value.excerpt: A year ago, none the wiser about what 2020 would bring, I reflected on the pivotal moment that the AI community was in. 2018 had seen a series of high-profile automated failures, like self-driving car crashes and discriminatory recruiting tools.

value.title: To make AI a success, every child needs to understand the risk and potential of algorithms
value.excerpt: According to the AI Council, the biggest barrier to AI deployment is skills - and it starts as early as school.

value.title: How AI Can Remove Bias From The Hiring Process And Promote Diversity And Inclusion
value.excerpt: Companies have been struggling with how to mitigate and reduce biases of all kinds in their hiring practices, while attempting to promote diversity and inclusion in their cultures and ecosystems, to help their organizations and employees thrive at the highest levels.

value.title: Singapore central bank reports successful first phase of ethical AI project
value.excerpt: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) today announced the successful conclusion of the first phase of the Veritas initiative which saw the development of the fairness assessment methodology in credit risk scoring and customer marketing.

value.title: What Buddhism can do for AI ethics
value.excerpt: Buddhism teaches us to focus our energy on eliminating suffering in the world. The explosive growth of artificial intelligence has fostered hope that it will help us solve many of the world’s most intractable problems.

value.title: Microsoft wants to use AI to turn your friends and family into 3D chatbots
value.excerpt: A patent published by Microsoft describes the process of creating an AI chatbot based on a real-life person using their social data, photos, and even voice recordings.

value.title: Why diversity is key to a successful AI strategy
value.excerpt: However, AI bias isn’t an issue limited to big-name companies and high-profile scandals. A recent report from Capgemini that surveyed 800 organisations and 2,900 consumers has revealed 90% of organisations are aware of at least one instance where an AI system had resulted in ethical issues for their business.
